The Sydney Morning Herald reports the club will ask Cordner to consider sitting out for six to twelve months following his latest head knock.
Watch State of Origin I REPLAY on Kayo with no ad-breaks… [+2608 chars]

articles.title: ‘Thoughtless’ All Blacks ‘prone to melting down’: Kiwi journos raging over dead rubber defeat - Fox Sports
articles.description: It was a dead rubber and the Bledisloe Cup remains the All Blacks for an 18th straight year but New Zealand is still up in arms over Saturday’s 24-22 defeat against the Wallabies.
articles.content:
With the series already wrapped up, coach Ian Foster wrung the changes for the game four at Suncorp Stadium and paid the price as he suffered his first loss since taking the reins.

articles.author: John Keim
articles.title: Washington Football Team QB Kyle Allen dislocates ankle - ESPN
articles.description: Washington quarterback Kyle Allen suffered a dislocated left ankle and a small fracture, a source told ESPN's John Keim. Alex Smith, who came on in relief, will start next week for the team.
articles.content:
LANDOVER, Md. -- Alex Smith is back where he was two years ago before his gruesome leg injury: starting at quarterback for Washington.
Washington Football Team coach Ron Rivera said Smith will start… [+6623 chars]
